scripts.dev: bun run preflight:dev && bun run services:up && bun run wait-for-postgres && bun run migration:up && API_ORIGIN=http://localhost:4000 concurrently -n next,bunapi -k "bun --bun next dev" "cd apps/api && bun install && bun --watch src/index.ts"
scripts.dev:web: bun run preflight:dev && bun run services:up && bun run wait-for-postgres && bun run migration:up && bun --bun next dev
scripts.dev:stop: bash -lc 'pkill -f "next dev" || true; pkill -f "concurrently -n next,bunapi" || true; pkill -f "bun --watch src/index.ts" || true'
scripts.services:up: bash -lc 'if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml up -d; else echo "[services:up] docker not found; skipping container startup"; fi'
scripts.services:stop: bash -lc 'if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml stop; else echo "[services:stop] docker not found; nothing to stop"; fi'
scripts.services:down: bash -lc 'if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml down; else echo "[services:down] docker not found; nothing to remove"; fi'
scripts.lint: bun run lint:eslint:check && bun run lint:prettier:check
scripts.test:all: bun run test:api && bun run test:web
scripts.test:api: cd apps/api && bun install && bun test
scripts.test:web: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env.development; set +a; bun run services:up && bun infra/scripts/wait-for-postgres.js && bun x node-pg-migrate --migrations-dir infra/migrations --envPath .env.development up && concurrently -n next,bunapi,buntest -k -s command-buntest "API_ORIGIN=http://localhost:4000 TEST_MODE=1 bun --bun next dev" "cd apps/api && bun install && TEST_MODE=1 API_PORT=4000 bun src/index.ts" "sleep 3 && bun test tests/unit && bun test tests/ui && bun test tests/integration/models && bun test tests/integration/services/tegma-scraper.test.js && bun test tests/integration/services/whatsapp-notifier.test.js && bun test tests/integration/services/cargo-processor.test.js && bun test tests/integration/repositories && bun test tests/integration/api"'
scripts.api:dev: cd apps/api && bun install && bun --watch src/index.ts
